# Kingston Kuan

> Personal website of Kingston Kuan, a software engineer from Singapore who previously worked at Jane Street, TikTok, and Verkada. Currently building independently.

## About

Kingston Kuan is a software engineer based in Singapore. He has professional experience at:
- Jane Street (Software Engineer)
- TikTok (Software Engineer)
- Verkada (Software Engineer)

He is currently working on independent projects.

## Projects

- [Tambourine](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice): Your personal voice interface into any app
- [Simple Chromium AI](https://github.com/kstonekuan/simple-chromium-ai): Use local LLM in Chromium browsers
